item.title: v7.0 Overhaul Decision
item.description:
v7.0 Overhaul Decision

Summary: Recognized Codex scaling limits and initiated v7.0 overhaul: dual-layer architecture (Core + Archive) and legacy integration workflow.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 7

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
